programme.title: LAKSHMI

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 2
programme.desc: Between Cap d'Antibes and the Calanques de Marseille, the coastal footpaths lead us past some of the most spectacular beauty spots on the shores of the Mediterranean and offer a unique view of Provence and its heritage.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 1
programme.desc: A young woman wakes up in hospital after a car accident. Completely amnesiac, she has forgotten everything, including her identity, but the police recognise Marina Masson, a girl kidnapped eleven years ago. Her parents, now separated, hurry to her. Then the body of the suspected kidnapper, Ivan Claes, is found.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 2
programme.desc: Marina secretly meets someone called Mael, with whom she's planning to run away. As Laurent Masson, Marina's father, becomes closer to Helene, his ex-wife, and their children, an identity card in the name of Alexandra Martinez is found in the jacket Marina had lost. Is she an imposter?

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: etre Femme A Katmandou
programme.desc: Sublime mountains, hamlets cut-off from the world, age-old religious and cultural traditions... Time seems to have forgotten Nepal, this little country nestling at the foot of the Himalayas. Yet, here as well, society is shifting: women are beginning to change the rules to make a place for themselves in society.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 9
programme.desc: Steeped in Japanese culture and his passion for it, Jean-Michel Letellier is a virtuoso, an artist extending the limits of paper as a material, in search of boundaries he says has not yet reached after many years of exploration.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 803
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Quartier Recherche - EP 9
programme.desc: Pascal and Pierre-Jean are looking to set up home in a lively district of Montreal but the shortage of properties on the market makes their search all the more complicated. Corey and Evelyne still manage to dig up two interesting possibilities, in Vieux-Montreal and in Griffintown.

Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: L'albanie, La Nouvelle Perle De La Mediterranee
programme.desc: Albania is one of Europe's most touristic countries. Despite being scarred by years of communism and shortages, the pearl of the Adriatic has today become a leading Mediterranean destination thanks to its idyllic beaches, turquoise waters, majestic landscapes, typical villages, attractive prices...

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 28
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 5
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Quartier Recherche - EP 9
programme.desc: Pascal and Pierre-Jean are looking to set up home in a lively district of Montreal but the shortage of properties on the market makes their search all the more complicated. Corey and Evelyne still manage to dig up two interesting possibilities, in Vieux-Montreal and in Griffintown.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 38
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 52
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 6
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 12
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 45
programme.desc: Alix gives Walrus the idea of opening a restaurant in the land of the Wonderfolk. But the unappetising dishes on the menu aren't to everyone's taste.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 5
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1580
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires - EP 23
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Nous Maigrirons Ensemble
programme.desc: Convinced that his portliness may be one of the reasons for his professional setbacks, Victor Lasnier, a writer and director, decides to go on a diet. He discovers an industry designed to take his money and his extra kilos.

programme.title: A La Poussiere
programme.desc: For the last few months, Fazia has begun her days as a cleaner at the Martin-Pelissards', who are reluctant for her work to be legally declared. Then, one morning, an incident turns into a race against time and a desperate attempt to keep her job.

programme.title: Dans Le Noir
programme.desc: After surviving the journey across the Mediterranean, a young Guinean migrant finds refuge in Paris with a Senegalese dandy who makes a living by renting out his ID documents.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 12
programme.desc: Francois and Stephanie go on a double date with Roch and Gisele. Rollande is finally about to live her greatest dream: a meeting with the author Danielle Cuivre.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 13
programme.desc: It's the festive season once again. After fifty traditional years in the family home in Saint-Sacrement, Francois tries to persuade Jean-Pierre to celebrate Christmas Eve in his Montreal flat.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 1
programme.desc: On the same day that Anemone receives her diagnosis of early-onset Alzheimer's she also has to cope with the arrival of a new director at the funeral parlour where she works as an embalmer. Shaken, she has no idea how to announce the illness to friends and family.

programme.title: Ethique Helvetique - EP 1
programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? By analysing the history of the country, Tristan Miquel and Julien Girardin question the ethical and philosophical challenges facing their society and draw up parallels between the past and the present to stimulate reflection on different schools of thought.

programme.title: La Fille D'albino Rodrigue
programme.desc: Rosemay, aged 16, lives with a foster family and only sees her biological family during the holidays. One day, her father doesn't turn up at the train station to collect her. Since he doesn't reappear and her mother gives only evasive replies, the teenager begins to fear the worst...

programme.title: Le Mobilier
programme.desc: A gallery specialising in contemporary art organises a preview presenting a range of different artistic performances. Iliadia, the cleaner, can't understand the point of it and is irritated by the behaviour of certain visitors.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires - EP 23

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Au Fil De L'eau - La Corse, Un Paradis D'eau Vive
programme.desc: Anne-Cecile Monnier sets off to explore the ''Island of Beauty's'' fresh water. A veritable plunge into the crystal clear waters of Corsica's sublime rivers: the Fango, the Solenzara, the Asco and the Restonica and the endemic species that live in these little-known ecosystems, notably the Corsican trout (''salmo trutta macrostigma'').

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 804
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Nouveaux Nomades - EP 17
programme.desc: Kamini learns the basics of medieval combat in Laon. In Lot-et-Garonne, eric Perrin meets a magician of hyperrealism. Sophie Jovillard goes on a hike in the Pyrenees. In Paris, Yvan Hallouin samples chocolate. Lastly, Guillaume Pierre enjoys a dog-sled ride in Val de Mouthe.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1580
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Bien Bati - EP 3
programme.desc: Paquet House is supporting two families with their restoration adventures. elisa Gouin has inherited a family passion for her ancestral home. And a traditional builder passes on his know-how to his son.

programme.title: Bonjour, Mon Nom Est Kevin
programme.desc: Reaching the heights of popularity in the 1990s, Kevin is today one of the most maligned first names in Quebec. But why? Why such prejudice? Pierre-Yves Lord sets off to meet some of the province's Kevins, Kevens, Kavens, Kevuns... and discover their personal stories.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 10
programme.desc: From the small to the monumental, eric de Dormael's works are architectural in structure, playing with light and shade like ''shimmering sunshine on leaves or sunlight as it filters through shutter blinds''.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 29
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'isabelle Et Ricardo - EP 10
programme.desc: With Isabelle and Ricardo, it's time to get festive as they prepare cold roast beef with a horseradish vinaigrette, plus spicy devilled eggs with a crunchy breadcrumb topping.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Bien Bati - EP 3
programme.desc: Paquet House is supporting two families with their restoration adventures. elisa Gouin has inherited a family passion for her ancestral home. And a traditional builder passes on his know-how to his son.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 39
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 1
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 7
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 13
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 46
programme.desc: Alix dresses up as SuperSuperia to play with Humpty, alias SuperSuper, who is on a mission to help everyone. Hatter, who has to carry out an emergency repair to Walrus's clock, also becomes a superhero to try to calm Humpty's enthusiasm.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'isabelle Et Ricardo - EP 10
programme.desc: With Isabelle and Ricardo, it's time to get festive as they prepare cold roast beef with a horseradish vinaigrette, plus spicy devilled eggs with a crunchy breadcrumb topping.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 3
programme.desc: Alex/Marina discovers the joy of having a family and a loving mother, making her little sister eleonore very jealous. She decides to become Marina for good and breaks off with Mael, the friend she'd been through so much with. But Laurent thinks she's lying and secretly requests another DNA test...

programme.title: L'absente - EP 4
programme.desc: An anonymous writer threatens to denounce Alex/Marina if she doesn't obey his orders. eleonore has a new boyfriend: Mael, who has hidden his real identity from her. The police discover that Ivan Claes was innocent. Marina's murderer is manipulating them from the shadows, close nearby.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 4
programme.desc: In less than fifty years the planet has lost 70% of its bird, mammal, amphibian and reptile populations. But what is biodiversity, and how does it affect us directly? Caroline Nieberding, a biologist at UCLouvain, has some explanations and possible solutions.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: This week, we explore why Afro-descendants from the Americas and beyond, are choosing to leave their lives in the West to return to their ancestral Africa. In Ghana, we hear from some of the over 1,000 African Americans now calling it home.

programme.title: Movie - Unakkum Enakkum
programme.desc: A young man leaves his luxurious life to prove to his lover's brother that he is not a spoilt rich brat. He works hard and lives like a farmer till the next harvest, and wins everyone's heart.

programme.title: Movie - Vamanan
programme.desc: Anand, an actor who watches people for material, takes an interest in a thief, who takes him under his wing. But when a woman is murdered and Anand is blamed, he realises that he has been framed.

programme.title: Movie - Odipolama
programme.desc: Visu, a computer science student, falls in love with Anjali and comes to live in her locality. But problems force Anjali to make a tough decision, and she runs away from her home.

programme.title: Movie - Oli Pirandhadhu
programme.desc: Singaram, a car driver, falls in love with Kalyani, who comes to stay in his neighbourhood. But his dream shatters when he realises that she is already married to an old man.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.desc: Vicky often gets into trouble due to bad luck. Things change when he meets and falls in love with Shivani, the daughter of a rich businessman.

programme.title: Movie - Veerasaamy
programme.desc: Veerasamy, a lawyer and MLA, is a saviour of the oppressed and the biggest roadblock in the criminal activities of the local Health Minister and his wife who together run several illegal businesses.

programme.title: Movie - Vetrivel Shakthivel
programme.desc: Although he has cleared his IPS, a man's father asks him to work in their clothing store. He loves a woman very much, but her past poses a problem. Also, his father may be connected to a terrorist outfit.

programme.title: Movie - Namma Annachi
programme.desc: Annachi uses unscrupulous ways to help the villagers overcome their problems, while his son is stickler for rules and believes in abiding by the law. Contrasting views lead to a clash between the two.

programme.title: Movie - Priyamanavale
programme.desc: A westernised Vijay weds his industrialist father's sincere secretary who hails from a poor family. But their prenuptial agreement stipulates that he has the power to end his marriage after 12 months.

programme.title: Movie - Un Samayal Arayil
programme.desc: Kalidasan and Gowri are food lovers who get connected over a wrong phone call. Gradually, they develop feelings for each other but hide their true identities during their face-to-face meeting.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Mutham Oru Yudham
programme.desc: Oru Mutham Oru Yutham is a Tamil romantic movie directed by Suba Selvam. The film stars Uday Kiran and Swetha Basu Prasad.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Nadigayin Vaakkumoolam

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 45
programme.desc: PL Stories takes a look at the forgotten moments that truly defined a Premier League season, offering new perspectives on the games that shaped title races. As the season nears its conclusion, two former Premier League players alongside two football experts revisit iconic yet often overlooked moments, such as Steven Gerrard's infamous slip in 2014, which many believe ended Liverpool's title charge.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 31
programme.desc: We reflect on the life and career of Nolberto Solano, one of South America's football legends. From his early days in Peru to his pivotal role in the Premier League, we explore his journey, triumphs, and challenges. Featuring exclusive interviews and rare footage, we capture the essence of a player who transcended borders and inspired generations.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 4
programme.desc: Owen Hargreaves unpacks The Art of.. The Central Defensive Midfielder, drawing on his time with England and Manchester United. Featuring contributions from Rodri and Claude Makelele as they discuss the position's dynamics and tactical demands. Plus, a deep dive into Premier League icons like Kante and Fernandinho, players who defined the modern CDM.

programme.desc: All the very best of the week's programming and digital content from another action-packed Premier League match round.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND - FRI 11 APR (Live)
programme.desc: We're on the road exploring the city of Newcastle as Manchester United head to the North East, Forest centre-back Nikola Milenkovic spends three minutes with us, plus find out which English player is a master at speaking Spanish.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 01/02
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2001/2002 season.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 4
programme.desc: Owen Hargreaves unpacks The Art of.. The Central Defensive Midfielder, drawing on his time with England and Manchester United. Featuring contributions from Rodri and Claude Makelele as they discuss the position's dynamics and tactical demands. Plus, a deep dive into Premier League icons like Kante and Fernandinho, players who defined the modern CDM.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 35
programme.desc: This week on The Big Interview, two-time Premier League champion, Robert Pires sits down to talk through his career and all things Arsenal. Having joined the club during Arsene Wenger's reign, Pires played in one of the greatest sides in the clubs' history - as well as helping them achieve invincible status in 2003/04.

programme.title: FANTASY SHOW - FRI 11 APR
programme.desc: Saka or Salah? Foden or Fernandes? Wilson or Watkins? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy but this season the Fantasy Show is on hand to help you with those big decisions. Fantasy experts will crunch the numbers and give their opinion on which Premier League stars you should be selecting ahead of each FPL Gameweek.

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 11 APR (Live)
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. A phone-in for the digital generation, fans from around the world join our studio discussion via camera phones and weblinks to have their say about their teams and their favourite players.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 11 APR
programme.desc: This week's Preview Show we will look ahead to another thrilling weekend of Premier League action. Featuring discussion on Forest's game against Everton, Chelsea's home tie against Ipswich and Newcastle's matchup against the struggling Manchester United.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Paul Williams vs. Verno Phillips
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Junior Middleweights Paul "The Punisher" Williams (35-1, 26 KOs) and Verno Phillips (42-10, 21 KOs) as they battle for the vacant WBO Interim Belt at the Citizens Business Bank Arena in Ontario, California, USA, on November 29, 2008.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Edison Miranda vs. Willie Gibbs
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Super Middleweights Edison Miranda (26-2, 23 KOs) vs. Willie 'The Gladiator' Gibbs (20-1, 16 KOs) from the Miccosukee Indian Gaming Resort in Miami, Florida, USA. Bonus coverage includes Jason Litzau, aka 'The American Boy' (20-1, 18 KOs) vs. Jose Hernandez (21-3, 13 KOs).

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Hugo Hernan Garay
programme.desc: With the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Huck (33-1) defends against veteran contender Hugo Garay (34-6) at the Olympia Eissportzentrum in Munich, Germany. Huck, fighting in his adoptive home country, was making the 7th consecutive defense of his championship.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Oscar De La Hoya vs. Mike Grable
programme.desc: This edition highlights a bout early in the career of "The Golden Boy", fresh off his gold medal winning performance in the Olympic Games, as Oscar De La Hoya competes in just his 6th professional fight taking on 13-1-2 Mike Grable. De La Hoya had knocked out his first five opponents to start his illustrious career, and had his sights set on a World Championship less than two years after his debut. First, he would have to get passed Grable of Clarkston, Michigan, hoping for a historic upset.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Carlos Baldomir vs. Vernon Forrest
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Carlos Baldomir and Vernon Forrest facing off to determine the new WBC super welterweight world champion, a fight that earns both fighters an ovation at the end.

programme.title: FS MMA bodogFIGHT Season One Highlights
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode features all of the highlights from BodogFIGHT season one showing recaps and highlights of all the MMA scraps that took place in Costa Rica.

programme.title: WCCB Carlos Ocampo vs. Mikael Zewski
programme.desc: From the Colisee in Quebec, Canada, Mikael Zewski competes in front of his hometown fans against world-ranked veteran Carlos Ocampo of Mexico, with the WBC Continental Americas Super Welterweight Title on the line. Ocampo is a tough competitor, taking on the best in the world including Errol Spence Jr. for the IBF Welterweight World Championship. Zewski is also no stranger to the big stage, having held several North American and International WBA, IBF, and WBO titles himself.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Jean Pascal
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight championship contest featuring Bernard Hopkins and Jean Pascal meeting for a second time. Their original contest, just five months earlier, resulted in a controversial draw, and the WBC ordered a rematch. Also on the card, action from young heavyweight stud Deontay Wilder.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

Show 1, from the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, features Takakeisho, Tokushoryu, Kagayaki and Enho.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode brings you behind the scenes at the UFC Fan Expo with current UFC roster members Wanderlei Silva, Frank Mir and Donald "Cowboy" Cerrone. MMA:30 interviews the most popular ring girl in the game today, Arianny Celeste as she talks about her own MMA training exclusively on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 118

programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'p', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We eat some popcorn and pizza, and even have a pyjama party!

programme.desc: Hooper has planned a beach day for his friends. Phoebe is worried that Hooper might need help, so she tries to organise the day for him.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. programme.title: Europe Street Signs

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Scientists and entrepreneurs are testing radical ideas like solar radiation management and ocean fertilisation - and finding funding for it.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputing-where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear. Two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing. Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city. With almost every London street having a story behind it, there are surprising revelations along the way.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters - EP 3
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince - EP 3
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Of Greed And Ants - EP 5
programme.desc: The Hong Kong economy is booming in the 1970s. Wing Muk-tung aspires to be the master of the financial game as he approaches tycoon Tong Ho-fung. Ching Wing-chun and his buddies Chong Tai-hei and Luk Siu-fu also get involved.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 18
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2530
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: What If - EP 20
programme.desc: Regular girl Xia Guo is faced with a dilemma. Would she choose to live a home-sweet-home life with her boyfriend in her hometown, or seize the opportunity to forge a successful career in a big city?

programme.title: Gone Viral (Sr.2)
programme.desc: Many videos circulating online capture all kinds of viral moments that happened around the world in an instant. This programme selects topical or popular clips, discussing and analysing each video so that viewers can gain further insights.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 42
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: My Sweet Mobster - EP 7
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Seo Ji Hwan (Um Tae Goo) runs a company hiring ex-gang members to help reform their lives. Go Eun-Ha (Han Sun Hwa), a children's YouTube creator, accidentally injures him while working a part-time cleaning job. To her surprise, he recognizes her!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 20
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1925
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Call of Destiny - EP 2
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin (Carlos Chan) unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan (Hera Chan), who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite destiny?

programme.title: Moonlight Mystique - EP 3
programme.desc: Bai Shuo (Bai Lu) unexpectedly saves the powerful demon god, Fan Yue (Ao Rui Peng) while on her journey to seek immortality. The duo gradually goes from manipulation to mutual affection, and take on a fantastic journey to vanquish demons and spirits.

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao (He Yu), a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er (Yang Yutong), a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embark on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 13
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 7
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Janes husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lans hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lams husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 9
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 34
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 10
programme.desc: TVBs across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.desc: TVBs across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 36
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 37
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 14
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 8
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Janes husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lans hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lams husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.desc: TVBs across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 11
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 38
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 39
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: Foon, a womanizing radio DJ gets involved with Holli-yok (Maggie Cheung) who has an obsession with American movies. They wander around acting out movie parodies until one day, she catches him with another woman and he gets brain damage. Meanwhile, Foon's brother (Leslie Cheung) is a feminine florist who engages in a gender-bending battle with his cousin, the butch Teresa Mo.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: One Nite in Mongkok
programme.desc: A mainland hitman Loy is hired to avenge the death of a gangster's son but the police are onto him from the start. While hiding in the dense streets of Mongkok, Loy saves a call girl Dan Dan from some gangsters. Loy and Dan Dan are hunted around Mongkok by police and gangsters. Who wiIl find them first, the lawful force or the lawless one?

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Hai Sheng has been an undercover agent for eight years. After arresting the head of a criminal gang, he finally sheds his undercover life and resumes the life of a police officer. However, he finds his current life even tougher as he is not trusted by his colleagues, dumped by his girlfriend and pursued by criminals.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: The Conman 2002
programme.desc: Li Ka Shing has lived his entire life as a luckless guy, until he is advised by a master to move his ancestral tomb so as to change his luck. From that day onwards, Li wins at every game in the casino. When his rival uncovers the secret, he destroys Li's ancestral tomb to gain the upper hand. Will Li win the finals of the gambling competition?

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to stay with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil begins to unfold!

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the "Full Moon Scimitar", on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend "Investiture of the Gods", this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kam's empire.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s "a-go-go" era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, in Hong Kong, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gangsters again in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing's wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General's daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord's home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists' cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 42
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: My Sweet Mobster - EP 7
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Seo Ji Hwan (Um Tae Goo) runs a company hiring ex-gang members to help reform their lives. Go Eun-Ha (Han Sun Hwa), a children's YouTube creator, accidentally injures him while working a part-time cleaning job. To her surprise, he recognizes her!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 20
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1925
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Call of Destiny - EP 2
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin (Carlos Chan) unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan (Hera Chan), who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite destiny?

programme.title: Moonlight Mystique - EP 3
programme.desc: Bai Shuo (Bai Lu) unexpectedly saves the powerful demon god, Fan Yue (Ao Rui Peng) while on her journey to seek immortality. The duo gradually goes from manipulation to mutual affection, and take on a fantastic journey to vanquish demons and spirits.
